title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7011.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7011.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following definitions shall
apply to the terms listed below: (a) Commissioner shall mean the Commissioner of the New York State Office of

Addiction Services and Supports. (b) Jail physician shall mean the physician appointed or designated pursuant to
section
501
of the

Correction Law. (c) Medication
assisted treatment shall mean the treatment of chemical dependence or abuse and
concomitant conditions with medications requiring a prescription or order from
an authorized prescribing professional. (d) Chief administrative officer shall mean
the highest-ranking official of the facility. (e) Sheriff shall mean the individual having
custody of a local correctional facility pursuant to subdivisions (1) and (2)
of section
500-c
of the

Correction Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7011.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLIV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
